title: Application Developer/Architect
description: Developed and maintained RETS client and server software on Oracle and C#, praised as one of the fastest servers in the continental US and first to achieve compliance multiple times.
Tuned RETS performance, protocol compliance, and data handling to keep broker and MLS integrations reliable.
Built configurable ASP.NET MLS frontends where branding and business rules were driven by XML so each board could ship its own experience without code changes.
Created a market analytics and statistics module surfacing deep MLS metrics for brokers and administrators.
Coordinated deployments and maintenance windows with MLS stakeholders to keep uptime and data freshness high.
Provided ongoing support and troubleshooting for MLS customers while evolving the platformâ€™s architecture.
